product_name: Rossignol Temptation Pro Carbon Ski Poles - Women's
long_description: The women's Rossignol Temptation Pro Carbon ski poles are all-mountain poles with durable, very lightweight carbon shafts and bi-injected grips that fit comfortably in your hands. The women's Rossignol Temptation Pro Carbon ski pole use carbon fiber construction for featherweight performance. Race baskets are designed for packed snow, and provide reliable purchase on hardpack.
short_description: The women's Rossignol Temptation Pro Carbon ski poles are all-mountain poles with durable, very lightweight carbon shafts and bi-injected grips that fit comfortably in your hands.
